name: useConferenceSystem
description: A comprehensive hook for managing video conferencing state, including camera access, screen sharing, network monitoring, and automatic media quality adjustment.

props.name: options
props.description: Configuration options for the conference system.

schema.name: defaultAutoQuality
schema.description: Whether to enable automatic network-based quality scaling on mount.

schema.name: error
schema.description: Error message if camera access or capture fails.

schema.name: isActive
schema.description: Whether the camera stream is currently active.

schema.name: isLoading
schema.description: Indicates if the camera is currently requesting permissions or initializing.

schema.name: start
schema.description: Starts the camera capture with optional constraints.

schema.name: stop
schema.description: Stops the camera capture and clears the stream.

schema.name: stream
schema.description: The active MediaStream for the camera, or null if inactive.

schema.name: isOnline
schema.description: Boolean indicating if the browser has an active internet connection.

schema.name: speed
schema.description: Estimated downlink speed in Mbps.

schema.name: type
schema.description: The network connection type (e.g., '4g', 'wifi', 'unknown').

schema.name: current
schema.description: The currently applied quality level ('low', 'medium', 'high').

schema.name: isAuto
schema.description: Whether automatic quality adjustment is currently enabled.

schema.name: isChanging
schema.description: Whether a quality transition is currently in progress.

schema.name: set
schema.description: Manually sets the media quality level (overrides auto-quality).

schema.name: toggleAuto
schema.description: Toggles the automatic quality scaling logic on or off.

schema.name: error
schema.description: Error message if screen share access fails or is denied.

schema.name: isActive
schema.description: Whether the screen share is currently active.

schema.name: start
schema.description: Starts the screen share capture process.

schema.name: stop
schema.description: Stops the screen share and clears the stream.

schema.name: stream
schema.description: The active MediaStream for screen sharing, or null if inactive.
